attributes.action: create an independent body to scritinise and approve MPs expense claims.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The creation of an independent body to scrutinise MPs expense claims in accordance with industry best practice codes.  Reporting to the National Audit Office and publishing annual reports in the public domain.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
